name: JavaScript
Python
code:
a = 10
b = 5
print(a + b) # 15
print(a - b) # 5
print(a * b) # 50
print(a / b) # 2.0

name: Rust
Go
code:
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    a, b := 10, 5
    fmt.Println(a + b)
    fmt.Println(a - b)
    fmt.Println(a * b)
    fmt.Println(a / b)
}
